text: In the Court of the Crimson King is the debut studio album by English rock band King Crimson. The album was released on 10 October 1969, and helped with the making of prog-rock. The band at this point had Robert Fripp, Peter sinfield, Greg lake, Ian McDonald, Mel Collins and Jakko Jakszyk. == References == Category:1969 albums Category:Debut albums
title: In the Court of the Crimson King
